summary: Shrouded in the mists of Lake Illinalta, the Isle of the Akaviri continues to guard the secrets it has kept for millenia.
descriptionHtml:
Shrouded in the mists of Lake Illinalta, the Isle of the Akaviri continues to guard the secrets it has kept for millenia. Architecture never seen before throughout Tamriel is only the beginning. The island houses its own unique township and economy as well. There are places of worship unknown to  anyone but the residents,  and it is rumored that there are plants and creatures unknown to anyone but storytellers with the wildest of tales! While the island seems a bastion of strength and goodness, it is whispered that, when Magnus retires in his fiery glory beyond the mountains, a brooding malevolence rules the isle...

Detailed description and support is [url=http://www.worldwidemods.com/Mods/Akavir.aspx]available here[/url]

Please remember to register on our site! It\'s free, easy, and will guarantee that you are notified when a new update, expansion or mod is released!

[youtube]xxrcYZS7YdU[/youtube]

NOTE : For technical support questions related to this mod, please visit the home page for this mod, register and create a post in the technical support area of the mod forum. This way, we can better maintain focus for users scattered across numerous download points (such as Steam and Nexus for example).

Thanks for your valuable feedback!
author: Phoenixn aka Observe
